name: Community Service (raulitohuerta02)
description: This game is a class assignment from CDM 072: Intro to Games UC Davis, Winter 2023. Community Service is a partner assignment from myself (Raul Huerta) and my peer Noah Leslie. The game is based on my school's neighborhood area. Community members of the school neighborhood volunteer to clean the sidewalks where students navigate to school. Garden Valley Elementary School is currently facing issues with Homeless encampments placed a few yards from the school entrance. They often leave their debris and litter outside, which blows toward the school.
